info.title: Material Price - Update
info.description: This service enables you to change the existing prices of your materials by importing new prices into the material master. If stock exists for the material, a revaluation posting is generated. The revaluation posting indicates the material ledger document number and year.

x-sap-shortText: Update material prices using this synchronous inbound service
